author: UltPanda
description: A modern suggestion system for Discord communities. Users can submit suggestions that will be posted to a designated channel. Community members can vote on suggestions with interactive buttons, and staff can approve or deny suggestions using a streamlined button interface.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Suggestion cog v2.0! This version features a modern button-based voting system. Use `[p]help suggestion` to see all available commands, and make sure to set up the suggestion channel with `[p]suggestionset channel`. Users will vote using buttons instead of emoji reactions!
short: Modern community suggestion system with button voting and staff approval
